content:
After adding Oka predicates, #28451 and #28477 provide the first use cases of IsOka:

  • #28451: Add IsNoetherianRing.of_prime stating that if all prime ideals of a ring are finitely generated, then this ring is Noetherian
  • #28477: Golf IsPrincipalIdealRing.of_prime

As suggested in discussion of #27200, we also wanted to golf Ideal.isPrime_of_maximally_disjoint but importing Mathlib.RingTheory.Ideal.Oka in Mathlib.RingTheory.Ideal.Maximal creates an import loop that we don't know how to solve.

(cc @ROBIN Marc, my co-author)
Thank you @Kenny Lau for your review! I'm answering your easiest suggestions now and @ROBIN Marc or I will check the ones that need a bit of thinking in the next days
